title: How to Make Pasta Salad (Toddlers)

steps.headline: Get a saucepan and sauté the zucchini, carrots, and broccoli.
steps.description: You'll want a crisp, but tender-side result.

steps.headline: Drain the water from the pasta pot.
Mix the vegetable mixture and pasta together in a bowl and lightly coat it with parmesan cheese.
Garnish the dish with lemon juice or dressing.

text: Boil the pasta al dente.  Get a saucepan and sauté the zucchini, carrots, and broccoli. You'll want a crisp, but tender-side result. Drain the water from the pasta pot.  Mix the vegetable mixture and pasta together in a bowl and lightly coat it with parmesan cheese.  Garnish the dish with lemon juice or dressing.  Finished.
